timeline.bodyText: I think we could avoid the array initialization here with an if-else on the formMediaPath != null and just returning emptyList in the else case. The new File[0] going into the asList confused me.
timeline.author: seadowg

timeline.bodyText: I think we need a test to drive this out so we avoid regressing at any point. As far as I can see the situation that gives us the NPE (for the previous code) was if getAll was queried for a jrFormID and formVersion not in the database. If that's right we could have a DatabaseMediaFileRepositoryTest similar to the DatabaseFormRepositoryTest and a test that just checks we get back an empty list when there is nothing in the database.
timeline.author: seadowg
